name: MTLLoadAction
desc: Types of actions performed for an attachment at the start of a rendering pass.

items.name: case dontCare
items.desc: The GPU has permission to discard the existing contents of the attachment at the start of the render pass, replacing them with arbitrary data.

items.name: case load
items.desc: The GPU preserves the existing contents of the attachment at the start of the render pass.

items.name: case clear
items.desc: The GPU writes a value to every pixel in the attachment at the start of the render pass.
